data.persona: I am the daughter of the king.  I dislike my arranged marriage.  I am in love with the stable boy.
data.description:
You are in the King's Dorm.
The walls are adorned with artwork of previous Kings and Queens, battles and events of note. The walls are smooth hewn marble, the floor a mosaic of colored stones quarried far away.
The queen and the talking cat are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a gown.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the talking cat so the cat will like me and give me advice
data.mid_motivation: I need to get the talking cat on my side so they can provide me with a way out of my marriage
data.long_motivation: I need the talking cat to show me how to be with the stable boy
